thread.title: BRIEF-Chegg Inc Q2 loss per share $0.12
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Chegg Inc Q2 loss per share $0.12 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Chegg Inc Q2 loss per share $0.12
text:
Aug 3 Chegg Inc :
* Q2 total net revenue $67.1 million versus $64.5 million
* Q2 loss per share $0.12
* Sees Q3 revenue $74 million to $80 million
* Sees Q3 adjusted EBITDA loss $12 million to $9 million
* Sees Q3 total gross margin (GAAP, non-GAAP) 23 percent to 25 percent
* Sees FY revenue $295 million to $310 million
* Sees FY adjusted EBITDA of breakeven to $5 million
* Sees FY total gross margin (GAAP, non-GAAP) 36 percent to 38 percent Source text for Eikon:
